info.name: Clean black & grey FACEBOOK + sticky fixed top bar
info.description:
Initial release: 01/24/2011

This is based on an old theme originally created by ModStar and later continued by VincentD. I had to recreate the three icons and rewrite some code, but now everything looks fine. If you are fed up by all these fancy themes with multicolored backgrounds and are looking out for a clear simple theme based on the original facebook design then this is what you're looking for!

I also added code to make the top bar stay in position while scrolling down and some other tweaks. Very handy, special thanks to Code.Red! http://userstyles.org/styles/25094

By the way, credits for this release also go the Wills Bithrey, I borrowed some of his (very well-written) code from his absolutely fantastic Theme called "Subtle texture and shading": http://userstyles.org/styles/41499
info.additionalInfo:
Update 10/13/11: Changed left sidebar to white.

Announcement 10/13/11: I've heard that facebook already activated the new "timeline" update for some countries. This is a message to all those who already have timeline activated: Please report if there are any issues involved with this change. I personally can't activate it yet where I live, so I can't find out if there's any trouble. Please send me a PM if you know more.

Update 09/21/2011: Facebook decided to change their design (again), so I changed the Theme accordingly. If you like it or have any suggestions, please leave a comment :)

Update 09/16/2011: Limited the theme to facebook only. (I had previously missed two lines of code in the last update, sorry for that guys) 
+ the theme now has a new name: Clean black & grey FACEBOOK + sticky fixed top bar

Update 09/14/2011: Facebook changed the top bar, so the theme stopped working today. But I found the problem and fixed it. The theme is now fully usable again! Enjoy :)
